results.title: Inception
results.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is tasked with planting an idea into a CEO's mind.

results.title: The Dark Knight
results.overview: Batman battles the Joker, who seeks to undermine his influence and create chaos in Gotham City.

results.title: The Lion King
results.overview: A lion cub prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father but learns the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

results.title: Titanic
results.overview: A young man and woman from different social classes fall in love aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

results.title: Avengers: Endgame
results.overview: The Avengers assemble to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

results.title: Parasite
results.overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family, leading to unforeseen consequences.

results.title: Frozen
results.overview: Two sisters must save their kingdom from an eternal winter while discovering the true meaning of sisterly love.

results.title: Pulp Fiction
results.overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in a series of vignettes of violence and redemption.

results.title: Spirited Away
results.overview: A young girl is trapped in a mysterious spirit world and must work in a bathhouse to free herself and her parents.

results.title: Jurassic Park
results.overview: A theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run loose.
